meta.description: Optimize the cost of a diet plan to meet daily nutritional requirements using available food items.

sets.name: FOOD_ITEMS
sets.description: Different food items available in the supermarket.

params.name: protein
params.description: Protein content of each food item in grams.

params.name: carbohydrates
params.description: Carbohydrate content of each food item in grams.

params.name: calories
params.description: Caloric content of each food item.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of servings of each food item to purchase.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(cost[i] * x[i] for i in FOOD_ITEMS)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of purchasing food items.

constraints.name: protein_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(protein[i] * x[i] for i in FOOD_ITEMS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 71 grams of protein are consumed.

constraints.name: carbohydrates_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(carbohydrates[i] * x[i] for i in FOOD_ITEMS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 107 grams of carbohydrates are consumed.

constraints.name: calories_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(calories[i] * x[i] for i in FOOD_ITEMS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 1623 calories are consumed.
